plot outline: In Bhokarwadi village people are drunk for 24 hours and have no livelihood their drunken habits have also taken life's of many people in the village.Arjun a young star then tries many ways to free his village from alcoholism and gets the support of village dancer Mohini.but when the actual time comes to free his village from this habit Mohini ditches him at the last minute.
title: Sagla Karun Bhagle
plot: Arjun tries all possible ways to free his villagers from alcoholism.

In Bhokarwadi village people are drunk for 24 hours and have no livelihood their drunken habits have also taken life's of many people in the village.Arjun a young star then tries many ways to free his village from alcoholism and gets the support of village dancer Mohini.but when the actual time comes to free his village from this habit Mohini ditches him at the last minute.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com

In Bokharwadi village men are drunk 24/7 many fear to marry their daughters in village.Arjun one of the youngsters sees his friends always drowned in drinking an with no job are spoiling their lives and is father is also one among them.Mohini a dancer arrives in village and Arjun gets fascinated by her beauty and decides to free village from alcoholism while Sarita a school teacher who secretly loves Arjun also plans to shut liquor shops in village.Arjun,Mohini and Sarita team up make the village alcohol free with several village women and successfully close the liquor shop.But Mohini ditches him when Arjun is being felicitated by villagers Mohini starts her own liquor shop at the same place.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
